subject: Citibank Canada Citigroup Plac
body:
Citibank Canada Citigroup Place 123 Front Street West,
Suite 1900, Toronto, Ontario M5J 2M3.
Attention Dear:
Once again I am writing this E-mail message to ask you; does it mean
that you are no longer interested to claim your outstanding coca cola
winning valued at a total sum of $12 Billion US Dollar or are you not
receiving our notifications E-mailed?
However; your response will determine your interest. 
Failure to comply
with the remaining payment of $100 immediately is a confirmation that
you have rejected your fund and our noble Bank will have no other
option than to allow the Canadian government to use the fund for this
homeless project as they are threatening to do since.
Keep in communication on below Email 
citibankofcanada5@gmail.com
 addresses,
TELEPHONE: +1 ( 323 438 9888 ( S.M.S ) only for record purposes. And
don't forget you are permitted to pay the fee $100 through either: BTC
Wallet account iTunes card Ebay Gift Cardworth $100 only
. Or you
Signed.
John Hastings
Chairman/CEO
citibankofcanada5@gmail.com
Citibank Of Canada.

subject: Re: Citibank Canada Citigroup Plac
body:
Hello John Hastings,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite an unexpected surprise! A billion US dollars is a lot of money. Can you tell me more about how I won this? I don't remember entering any Coca Cola contest.

Also, could you please explain why there's a fee involved? I'm not very familiar with these processes and would appreciate some clarification.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards.

Best wishes,
John
